name: Pankkake
description:
You're the sexiest pancake chef in town!

Use the left and right arrow keys to collect ingredients that are presented on the top right of the screen. Avoid wrong ingredients, as they will deduct your health meter. Every time you collect an aphrodisiac ingredient, your sexy meter increases.

Once your sexy meter is full, you get access to the Sexy Bonus round. Press the up key to shoot cream on stacks of pancakes to get easy bonus points!
